1.content:
Your name is Jason and today is your lucky day. The lab technicians at the hospital you work at have perfected(or so they think) a new shrink-ray for operations. It is going to be used to shrink doctors down to size so they can explore the human body at a closer perspective. This is the first hospital in the world to use this technology, so everyone is excited. On your break, you call down to the lab, and ask to speak to your friend Misty. Misty answers and you tell her that you have to ask her a favor and you ask if you can come down. See says yes, and you start on your way immediately. On your way you notice all the nurses and other female employees' feet and still no luck today. You see, you have a huge foot fetish, but hospital rules prevent anyone from wearing sandals or other footwear barefoot. The best you ever see is from visitors or someone wearing stockings. Discouraged, you come to the back door of the lab, and knock three times. This was yours and Misty's secret code to let her know that it was you, because she had to sneak you in. Finally the door opens, and you are greeted by Misty's smiling face. "Jason, we've only got 15 minutes before everyone gets back from lunch. What can I do for you?" You would like to answer her by saying "go out with me!", as you have had a secret crush on her since you started working here. Oh how you've longed to be near cute 5'3" petite frame. She has the most beautiful blue eyes, and short blond hair. "Jason? Hello? Are you going to answer me?"
"Oh, right, sorry. I was just wondering if I could sneak a peek at the new shrink ray before it gets locked up today?"
"Jason, you know that I'm not supposed to, but if you promise you won't tell anybody.."
"OK, OK, I promise," you say as she takes you to a room with a large mounted rifle-looking object in the middle of it. You ask her to show you how it works, and she had hinted the other day that if she thought she could get away with it that she would show you. Remembering her words from a few days ago, Misty said, "Okay, but we must hurry." With that, she corrected all of the settings on the shrink ray and placed an office chair in the center of a circle on the other side of the room. You both placed a pair of goggles on and got behind the machine. "Five seconds until the process begins!" "Four.....Three.......Two..."
You couldn't stand it anymore. Your desire to fulfill your lifelong fantasy takes over as you dash into the line of sight of the machine. "One.....No, Jason! Wait!" Misty cried as a red beam shot out and hit you in the chest as things began to grow quickly. In the distance you could see Misty staring with her mouth wide open as you continued to shrink down to...........
1.title: Your dream come true

"Here, climb up onto my hand" she said as she lowered her gigantic hand down on the ground in front of you, and you hopped on. "What's wrong, Misty? I'm alright. This is something I've always wanted to happen to me!"
"Jason, I'm afraid that I have bad news. The shrink ray overloaded and.........

112.content:
"You see Jason, the ray has not yet been perfected. The problem we have is that things continue to shrink beyond height we want them to be. I don't know how small you are going to become." Her sultry voice was loud as a freight train to my tiny ears.

"Please, Misty, could you hold it down. I'm right here, you don't have to scream."

"I'm sorry Jason. I didn't realize that your ears would become more sensitive to sound. You are going to have to speak up, yourself, I can barely hear you." Even her whisper was slightly louder than conversational level.

"Listen, Misty," I shouted, "I don't see what the problem is. Just reverse the settings and return me to normal."

"That isn't possible, Jason. We haven't figured out how to do that, yet. We believe we are at least six months away from figuring out how to reverse the process."

Clearly, I had gotten more than I bargained for. I couldn't worry myself with that now. I had impulsively set this whole thing in motion, and since I had no control over what was happening, all I could do was enjoy myself. In some respects I found my situation liberating, like I was a new person, not the old, shy Jason, who had trouble approaching beautiful women. And I had always dreamed about being in this situation, being tiny standing in the hands of a girl like Misty. Looking up at her, I saw the concern in her eyes.

"I'm sorry I did this Misty. I know I violated your trust. I would completely understand if you just left me to fend for myself."

Misty looked down at me consolingly and said:
112.title: No Way Up.

13122.content:
"Man, I'm stupid for even thinking about trying that," you say to yourself as you look away from the distant ground below you. A moment later, you hear a car door open, and look around you as Misty sets her purse in the passenger seat of her car and then gets in herself.
"Sorry Jason, I know it's no luxurious way to travel in there but there's really no other safe way. Which radio station do you like?"
"97.3!" you yell out, but Misty's face doesn't even change.
"Oh. Sorry, forgot you were so quiet," Misty grinned. "Here," she says as she leans over towards her purse with her head turned, her ear facing you, only an inch away from your miniscule body. You feel like you're looking into a gargantuan ear-shaped satellite dish. It's simply huge! Until now, all you'd thought about was Misty's feet, but you can't help but find this new situation slightly appealing.
"Uh..97.3 please!" you shout once again.
"97.3? Alright, that's my favorite!" says Misty as she turns her radio on. Knowing that having a casual conversation with you on her way home is next to impossible while she's driving, Misty simply smiles to you, and drives to her apartment.
"Alright, we're home!" says Misty as she picks up her purse along with you and starts walking to her door. Moments later, you feel your transportation suddenly stop moving, and shortly later you see a bright light fill the room your in.
"Ok, you can come out of there now," you hear Misty say, and as you turn to look at her, a gigantic hand reaches into the purse and cups itself next to you. You glady accept the ride, and after a quick up and down elevator movement, Misty sets her hand down on the countertop and opens her fingers. You walk out on to the smooth white surface and look around. You've done it. Misty's apartment. You smile as you imagine that nothing bad can possibly happen now.
Misty sits down at a stool next to her countertop and rests her chin in her hand, setting her elbow right next to you, which from your perspective is a far more appealing Leaning Tower of Pisa. Misty smiles and sighs.
"Well..now what are we gonna do? I don't know whether that ray wears off by itself or what. Can I get you anything?"
13122.title: Misty's apartment;  Off-duty at last.

choices: "Go ahead and take off your socks!"

131221.content:
"Oh you're hungry? Of course, you spent so much time in my purse I nearly forgot you still had to eat!" Misty glanced around her small kitchen to see if there was anything edible that was your size. Then with a slightly embarassed grin, she looks back at you. "Well I'm hungry for pretzels so..is it ok if I just break off small pieces for you?"
You nod several times, and Misty smiles and grabs a can of pretzels. "Ok if we watch some TV too?" she asks, as she brings her hands down next to you.
"Of course!" you say loudly as you run up into her palm, and with a smile, she carries you over to her small loveseat-type sofa. Misty sits down first on the right side sideways, with her knees at 90 degree angles and her feet planted on the left cushion. You gasp to see that she'd removed her tennis shoes and was once again only in her white socks. As you look at them, Misty sets you down on the left arm rest, not far from where her feet were resting. If you'd ever had a golden opportunity thus far in your adventure, this was it. But your pleasant thoughts are suddenly interrupted as two of Misty's fingers suddenly appear in front of you and gently drop a volleyball sized chunk of a pretzel before you.
"It's..hehe..as small of a piece as I could break off. I know it's still huge but at least you wont starve eh?"
You smile at Misty and nod, then take a bite out of the salty wheat snack, but then your mind resumes its original course of thoughts. Misty turns the TV on to Comedy Central's "Daily Show", and the two of you watch for a few minutes. Though you weren't really watching, you were just killing some time because you didn't want to seem too eager to be at Misty's feet. You'd always been shy about your fantasy. After 5 minutes, you can't take anymore, and you stealthily slide down the left armrest of her sofa on to the cushion. You gasp, as though you're staring at the gateway to heaven. Misty's socked toes are only about 5 inches (regular scale) in front of you. The air already smells different, and like a boy at a playground, you sprint across the cushion until you at last reach Misty's foot.
"I can't believe it.." you say to yourself as you run your hand across the thick wool fibers. Then, grinning ear-to-eat, you take hold of them and climb up until you're standing on the part of Misty's sock immediatly above the space between her 1st and second toe. Seconds later, she looks down at you and instantly turns a bright shade of red.
"J-Jason, what are you doing??"
"Oh uh..this looked more.. comfortable than the armrest over there. Besides, it was freezing up there and it felt pretty lonely you know?" you say, trying to sound casual and fun.
"But..doesn't it stink? I can imagine, it's got to smell terrible there!"
"I don't think so!" you say, and this time you really mean it. The smell of Misty's foot seems to be all around you, and it's more invigorating than anything you've ever felt in your life. "In fact it's kind of nice."
"Nice??" Misty says, blushing even more. You could tell she was fairly shy about her feet. "..No way, you're crazy," she says, but at the same time she diverts her eyes and grins slightly. "My feet smell terrible, that smell will kill ya if you stay there much longer."
Now's your chance. "Oh yeah? Try me!"
Misty's eyes widen as she makes an inquisitive look. "How?"
